summary: Diff implements a new PageShell/Container/Typography system and applies a dark-luxury theme across many pages/components (Header/Footer, Wallet/Swap, AR/Map/Profile/Rules, Docs/Landing). However, the diff also appears to introduce multiple non-requested product/features (DAO backend-style interactions, gamification/social sharing/XP, new bottom navigation) and may not apply the global PageShell offset consistently to all routed pages (notably HomePage).

missing_requirements.requirement: All routed pages should render their first meaningful content below the fixed header using a single consistent site-wide approach (shared page wrapper/page shell).
missing_requirements.reason: A PageShell with pt-20 is added and used in many pages, but HomePage.tsx (a critical routed page) does not show use of PageShell/Container and still uses a full-screen section with absolute-positioned elements, so the global/top-offset approach is not evidenced as applied site-wide to all routes.

hallucinated_features.description: DAO governance functionality with creating proposals, listing proposals, voting system, real-time updates/auth checks (i.e., new/expanded product capability rather than purely visual/layout changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly limits scope to frontend-only visual/layout changes and forbids new functionality changes; the diff summary states DAO now has full backend integration-style behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Gamification/social sharing flows with +1 XP reward notifications in Plant/Rescue confirmation modals.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; violates “presentation changes only” constraint by adding new reward/XP/social-sharing behaviors.

hallucinated_features.description: TokenInfoModal print functionality and social sharing buttons (Twitter/Facebook/WhatsApp/Telegram).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; adds new user actions/features beyond visual redesign.

hallucinated_features.description: New/expanded BancoCentral dashboard behaviors including persistent AR Distribution Initialized status stored in localStorage, Force Initialize admin button, DAO canister status indicator with polling, updated mainnet canister IDs, BigInt sanitization.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and goes beyond visual/layout work into new behaviors/state persistence and canister/environment-related configuration changes.

hallucinated_features.description: New fixed BottomNav with 7 tabs and translated labels / corrected route path.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals include not changing routing structure or adding new navigation items; adding a new bottom navigation bar with multiple tabs is a navigation/IA change.

hallucinated_features.description: New/expanded Tutorial page content and accordion instructions (login/bonus, energy/levels/XP, planting/rescuing rules, legal warnings, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires maintaining current content and functionality; adding/expanding tutorial instruction content is not evidenced as purely visual/layout refactor.

hallucinated_features.description: SEO/metadata changes in index.html emphasizing new marketing positioning text (title/OG tags).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest scope is visual/layout redesign while maintaining current content/presentation, and SEO copy changes are content changes.
